paragraphs: I grew up in Blomstermåla, Sweden and Studied Computer Science at Linköping University. For the past ten years I've lived in Stockholm and worked at Paradox Interactive AB as a C/C++ Programmer, Tech Lead and Build Engineer.
In my spare time I hang out with my family, code in Haskell and Nix, develop sound plugins, make music and go for runs.

sidebarSections.title: education
sidebarSections.content:
The Institute of Technology at Linköping University

Aug. 2008 – Mar. 2014

Master of Science in Computer Science and Engineering

sidebarSections.title: skills
sidebarSections.content:
Programming

C/C++, CMake, C#, Python, Haskell, Nix, HTML/CSS, WebAssembly

Development Tools

Git, GitLab, Conan, Artifactory, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Ansible, Visual Studio, Jira, SVN

General

Cross-Platform Development (Windows, Linux, macOS), Technical Leadership, CI/CD, Automation, Dependency Management, Infrastructure as Code

sidebarSections.title: hobbies
sidebarSections.content: Long distance running, music production, guitar, analogue synths, functional programming

sidebarSections.title: languages
sidebarSections.content:
Full proficiency in English and Swedish, both written and spoken

Basic understanding of German

Know at least 8 words of Hungarian

responsibilities.title: Package Management
responsibilities.description: Engineering package management solution by transitioning the dependency system to Conan

responsibilities.title: Build Infrastructure
responsibilities.description: Managing maintenance and enhancement of build system infrastructure on Azure

responsibilities.title: CI/CD System
responsibilities.description: Maintaining Kubernetes clusters and self-hosted instances of GitLab and Artifactory

responsibilities.title: CMake Maintenance
responsibilities.description: Managing third-party dependency logic for the Clausewitz Engine

responsibilities.title: Lead a team of Tools Programmers
responsibilities.description: Responsible for technical vision, project planning, and mentoring. Oversaw the development of programming and technical strategies

responsibilities.title: Clausewitz Engine
responsibilities.description: Game engine used by popular games like Stellaris, Crusader Kings III, Hearts of Iron IV and Europa Universalis IV. Maintained systems for graphics, GUI, particle effects, localization and network

responsibilities.title: Tools Foundation
responsibilities.description: Created framework for GUI tools development in the Clausewitz Engine

responsibilities.title: Node Editor
responsibilities.description: Designed a node based visual programming editor

responsibilities.title: Map Editor
responsibilities.description: Built an editor enabling Content Designers to design map based Grand Strategy Games

responsibilities.title: Artist/Content Pipeline
responsibilities.description: Enhanced asset pipeline tools used by 3D/2D Artists, Sound Designers, UX Designers and Content Designers
